headline: United States Washing Machine Market Trends & Forecast Report 2025-2033 Featuring Whirlpool, Samsung, LG, IFB, Panasonic, Haier, Godrej, General Electric, and Electrolux
summary: The United States Washing Machine Market is projected to grow from USD 18.54 billion in 2024 to USD 26.07 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 3.86% from 2025 to 2033. Key drivers include rising demand for energy-efficient appliances, technological advancements, and increased urbanization. Consumers are gravitating towards smart, connected washing machines equipped with AI and IoT capabilities, while e-commerce channels like Amazon and Best Buy expand market accessibility.
